member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.Test.AccountUndoHandler.DoLookup(Hyak.Common.IServiceOperations{Microsoft.Azure.Management.Batch.BatchManagementClient},System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Action@)
member.summary: Look up the undo operation for the given Account operation
member.param: The IDeploymentOperations instance used for the operation
The name of the deployment method
The parameters passed to the operation
The undo action for the given operation, if any
member.returns: True if an undo operation is found, otherwise false

member.summary: Discovery extensions - used to discover and construct available undo handlers in the current app domain
